page.title: 06My Home and Family
page.content: My name is Darren.I live at 8 0riole Way Heron Park Gloucester.My house is semi-detached and my favourite room is my bedroom because I have my toys and books there and I sleep in it.My second favourite is the living room. Our front door is brown with windows in it and a golden knocker.My family are Mummy,Daddy and my two sisters.My sisters are older than me and go to a different school.Mummy sometimes comes to school to help.I have a light over my bed so that I can read my books. Daddy has made me some cupboards with red handles.I have aeroplanes on my wallpaper and model aeroplanes hanging from the ceiling and they look as though they are flying.We have a telephone and we have plants under the telephone.We have a pretend fire that glows yellow.
